data.name: FindNanjingBranch
data.value: Nanjing Branch

data.name: FindNanjingBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No.17, Sec. 4, Nanjing E. Rd., Songshan Dist., Taipei City 105, Taiwan

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from the Taipei Arena, close to the Breeze Center, Taipei Arena shopping district, and 1 minute walk from the MRT Taipei Arena Station Exit 1.

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc2
data.value: With more than 300 square meters of professional fitness space combined with a variety of training equipment, you can optimize your training by exercising without restrictions.

data.name: FindXinyiBranch
data.value: Xinyi Anhe Branch

data.name: FindXinyiBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No. 81, Sec. 2, Anhe Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from Taipei 101, right at the MRT Taipei 101/World Trade Center Exit 3.

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc2
data.value: A unique personal training venue with indoor and outdoor space in the heart of Taipei City. Professional, spacious and private training space, combined with an outdoor sports lawn and PU runway, increasing the diversity of training programs. Not only fitness, but function toward life improvement.

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranch
data.value: Zhongxiao Branch

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No.21, Ln. 75, Sec. 1, Da’an Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc1
data.value: Located at B1 of the building behind Dinghao Market, 2 minute walk from MRT Zongxiao Fuxing station Exit 3 (or Exit 14 of East Metro Mall)

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc2
data.value: Rarely seen high-ceiling indoor personal training venue, bright lighting space, combined with a variety of training equipment, separate bath and shower, allowing you to freshen up more comfortably.

data.name: FindDongmenBranch
data.value: Dongmen Branch

data.name: FindDongmenBranchAdd
data.value: No.28, Sec. 2, Xinyi Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

data.name: FindDongmenBranchDesc1
data.value: Dongmen Branch is a 3 mins walk from MRT Dongmen Station exit 3, with ample space and natural sunlight.

data.name: FindDongmenBranchDesc2
data.value: The customized training space integrates stretching, artificial turf and weight training areas providing a dynamic training environment. Under the professional guidance of Beyond Fitness trainers, a safe, comfortable and private training environment is provided.

data.name: FindAnheBranch
data.value: XinyiAnhe Branch

data.name: FindAnheBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No. 81, Sec. 2, Anhe Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

data.name: FindAnheBranchDesc1
data.value: XinyiAnhe Branch is a 3 mins walk from MRT XinyiAnhe Station exit 2A.Located in the key area of Dunhua-Anhe, adjacent to the Lih-Jen international Private Elementary & Middle School.

data.name: FindAnheBranchDesc2
data.value: The private training space with 4m high celling and over 727 square meters, provides 25m sports lawn, individual group class venue, sports recovery rooms and comfortable separate shower room, where you are able to enjoy the professional training and service.

data.name: OurTeam
data.value: Our team

data.name: JoinUsTitle
data.value: Join Us

data.name: JoinUsDesc
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is devoted to developing professional one-on-one personal trainers. Beyond Fitness was established at Nanjing E. Road, by Taipei Arena and has since expanded to Xinyi (Taipei 101) and Zhongxiao Dunhua branches in three years. Behind all this, we are just a group of partners who want to let action and professional practice speak louder than words; and most importantly, provide service to the clients who have faith in us. We believe that education should be personalized so as training. We should customize accordingly to individuals’ need that is most suitable for "people", guiding customers to live a better life.

data.name: HereWeGo
data.value: Get started

data.name: AboutVedioDesc1
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is one of the largest custom training centers in Taiwan. We have more than 50 employees, providing personalized training services, health strategies, professional sports education training programs, certified health consultants and much more...

data.name: AboutVedioDesc2
data.value: Beyond Fitness is all about exercise.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc3
data.value: As professional fitness instructors, we provide training in a scientific and systematic way. We help you in a sincere manner and bring the highest benefits and value to each training course.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc4
data.value: We believe that if we help you change your lifestyle and lead you to a healthier life, you will naturally find the value and quality of your life.

data.name: BookNowTitle
data.value: Just four steps away!

data.name: BookNowStep1
data.value: BookDirectly via online, phone, email with our staff and get further information.

data.name: BookNowStep2
data.value: ConsultationYou will be carefully and thoroughly evaluated according to your conditions and needs. We assure you that the details of our trial course are clearly explained.

data.name: BookNowStep3
data.value: Trial and experienceHead to the branch you choose or distance learnging, there will be professional trainer giving you one-on-one training course based on your physical condition. Meanwhile, you will not only know your physical status but also our training process and venue.

data.name: BookNowStep4
data.value: CustomizationProfessional trainers will explain the purpose of workout sessions. Your physical condition and status will be discussed with suitable advice made just for you.

data.name: Reservation
data.value: Reservation

data.name: Features1Desc
data.value:
Beyond Fitness commits to…

  • Customized training program to give you safe and significant outcomes.
  • Professional coaches that clearly understand your physical condition and training progress.
  • Enhance every step of progress by discussing the course content with you.
  • Review your physical condition and course content periodically. We monitor your training quality.

data.name: Features2Desc
data.value:
Beyond Fitness owns six major international certificates in the fitness industry, allowing you to exercise in a professional and safe environment

  • American Council on Exercise (ACE)
  • The American College of Sports Medicine (ACSM)
  • National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA)
  • National Strength and Conditioning Association (NSCA)
  • National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM)
  • CrossFit
  • EXOS-XPS (The largest private athlete community in the US)
  • CPR+AED (The red cross society of the Republic of China, Taiwan)

data.name: Features3Desc
data.value:
Since the establishment of Beyond Fitness, we’ve continued to provide you with analysis during your workout and create your personalized physical data.

  • Fitness analysis library comprehensively analyzes your exercise and physical status.
  • Class schedule and content in the Cloud, offering you a better understanding of training session.
  • Practical articles to supply you with sports and health information at any time.
  • Interesting sports & healthy Q&A, bringing you fun interactions after the workout.

data.name: FAQBannerTitle
data.value:
We're happy to help
make it easy and simple!

data.name: FAQQestion1
data.value: Book your first trial course?

data.name: FAQQestion11
data.value: How to book for trial course?

data.name: FAQQestion12
data.value: What is the content of the course?

data.name: FAQQestion2
data.value: Fees

data.name: FAQQestion21
data.value: How to charge?

data.name: FAQQestion22
data.value: Are there any monthly fee, membership fee or handling charge?

data.name: FAQQestion23
data.value: Price of Virtual Training Course Package？

data.name: FAQQestion3
data.value: Why do we stand out?

data.name: FAQQestion4
data.value: What is the difference between a personal training course and a group training course?

data.name: FAQQestion5
data.value: Outside of classes, can I train by myself at Beyond Fitness?

data.name: FAQQestion6
data.value: How to get to Beyond Fitness?

data.name: FAQQestion7
data.value: Am I suitable for nutrition service, sports protection and sport massage?

data.name: FAQAnswer11
data.value: Contact us to start your trial course.

data.name: FAQAnswer12
data.value:
The content is as follows:
  • A careful consultation of your physical condition.
  • A careful analysis of your exercise habits and lifestyle.
  • Before Online course, trainer will check the hardware and software equipment with you in advance.
  • Trainers will bring out your training goals and results, leading you to a personalized program and experience.
  • Trainers are always by your side customizing your training courses.

data.name: FAQAnswer21
data.value:
• In person one-on-one training fee is charged based on the number of courses. Price ranges from TWD$1,700 to TWD$1,900.
  • Online one-on-one training fee is about TWD$1,200 to TWD$1,400 which is calculated based on the number of lessons.
  • Nutrition course will be reach the best effect with a “monthly” cycle, and the price will be TWD$4,000 per month.

data.name: FAQAnswer22
data.value: Beyond fitness provides 1 on 1 customized training. You don’t need to pay any other monthly fee, membership fee or handling charges.

data.name: FAQAnswer23
data.value:
• Basic package (including nutrition planning): TWD$8,600.
  • Advanced package (including nutrition planning) : TWD$12,600.

data.name: FAQAnswer3
data.value: Our team is second to none in the industry. Regardless of personal training, nutrition planning, recovery and injury prevention, all relevant personnel must equipped with relevant international and professional certification qualifications (which must be within the validity period), internal professional team management (performance tests every quarter). With scientific based training as the foundation with systematic records, analysis, we give every customer the most intimate and trustworthy service.

data.name: FAQAnswer4
data.value:
An excellent one-on-one personal trainer will customize training programs according to your goals, life style, physical condition of the day, helping you achieve goals together.

It is important to help you organize the rest of the non-exercise time with nutrition intake, fascia relaxation and injury prevention. We focus on your uniqueness and differentiation, and provide the most effective training!

data.name: FAQAnswer5
data.value: Of course! We provide customers who take training courses at Beyond Fitness with registration for self-training. Your trainer will schedule and customize training session (shown as P.I. Session) for you. By registration, the number of people is controlled to maintain the venue to provide you with the best training quality.

data.name: FAQAnswer6
data.value: Follow the directions below to reach us

data.name: FAQAnswer7
data.value:
• Nutrition course is designed for those who value self-health management, need to to lose weight, improve immunity, the three-high chronic disease group, and those who want to increase muscle mass through weight training. Beyond’s nutrition course provides you with good result and services.
  • Athletic Trainer (Sports protection) provides the most indispensable help to confirm the condition of your joints and muscles throughout your body. If you have sports injuries or joint and muscle-related issue, an athletic trainer can help you return to normal levels.
  • Our recovery coach team provides sport massage and stretching service which can help relieve stress for people who are prone to soreness such as long-term shoulders, necks, lower back or sitting for a long time.
